title: Bug 5675TVT: Export of multiple projects to Zip file fails while processing .vcmmeta file
description: Bug 5675TVT: Export of multiple projects to Zip file fails while processing .vcmmeta file Steps to recreate:1.
EB: Error message is displayed "Error exporting /b/.vcmmeta" (see image2).FWIW, it would be nice to have a more informative error message.2.
SR: Create simple project "a"2. Create simple project "b"3. Create file "aaa" in project a.4. Create file "bbb" in project b.5. Release the two projects to the repository with "Synchronize with Stream"6. Step 5 creates a .vcmmeta file for each project.Now select FileExport.7. Select "Zip File", and Finish (see image1).8.
